text: Rafał Augustyniak (born 14 October 1993) is a Polish footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder in Russia for FC Ural Yekaterinburg. ==Club career== On 21 June 2019, he signed with the Russian Premier League club FC Ural Yekaterinburg. ==External links== * * ==References== Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:People from Zduńska Wola Category:Sportspeople from Łódź Voivodeship Category:Association football defenders Category:Polish footballers Category:Widzew Łódź players Category:Jagiellonia Białystok players Category:Wigry Suwałki players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:MKP Pogoń Siedlce players Category:FC Ural Yekaterinburg players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia
title: Rafał Augustyniak
